title: OpenCode Remote Skills Manifest
description: Manifest file for defining instructions and other resources to be imported by the remote-skills plugin

$schema.description: JSON Schema reference for editor support

instructions.description: List of markdown instruction files to include. Paths are relative to the manifest.json location. This field is optional; omit or use empty array to include no instructions.

items.description: Relative path to a markdown file (must end with .md, no directory traversal allowed)
